body:
Reported by szari...@op.pl, Dec 30, 2010
Imho, Magarena should allow for a player to do those things Magarena shouldn't do automatically. I mean:
- dividing combat damage on two or more creatures
- reordering abilities on the stack they trigger at the same time
- Some spells and abilities with 'may' word shouldn't automatically treat my decision as "Yes, I agree". Maybe it's ok with gaining life, but I should decide for an ability like "you may draw a card". For example, what if I have no cards in the library, and this ability will trigger?

By the way:
I don't know if it's a bug but when Hypnotic Specter deals damage to you and a card is discarded at random, undo discarding and redo it. Magarena will draw a card to discard every time - the program will not always discard the same card. I suppose the same thing happens for each effect that draws something.

Sorry for my english if it's bad.

Comment 1 by project member ubeefx, Dec 30, 2010
No need to excuse for your English. 

I agree that allowing the player to do this does not need any changes to the AI and that it gives the player more control over the game. But it would still require some thought and work to do it properly.

About the conditional triggers for card drawing, that is something I might improve for next release.

You indeed found an exploit to view opponent's hand with the random discard.
The regular card drawing and discarding is however deterministic.
Not sure if I should fix this, it is a bit a side effect of undoing.
